'''Windblume Gift''' is an [[Adventure Item]] obtained during the [[Windblume's Breath]] Event.

This item is shown as a reward from ''[[Joy Above the Clouds]]''. It becomes [[Collei's Windblume]] and [[Lazurite Swirl]] when obtained.
